Uses of Class
moteur.CardsAJouer

  • Packages that use CardsAJouer 
    Package Description
    controller
    The package controller containes two classes, the Starter and the GameController.
    moteur
    The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor.
    Vue
    Using the concept "VMP", this packages containes the views of the project.

    • Uses of CardsAJouer in controller

      Methods in controller that return types with arguments of type CardsAJouer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<CardsAJouer> GameController.getTrophies()
      getter

    • Uses of CardsAJouer in moteur

      Methods in moteur that return CardsAJouer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CardsAJouer Offer.getOfferByIndex​(int index)
      By calling this methode, we can get card by entering the index of the card, which should be 0 or 1.
      CardsAJouer Player.makeOfferToOthers​(int index)
      A Player can make offer to others, when other player chooses this one, this methode will be called, with the parameter index, this Player will return the card, by using the methode getOfferByIndex(index).
      CardsAJouer Stack.stackCardsPeek()
      This methode returns the result of the LinkedList.peek();
      CardsAJouer Stack.stackCardsPoll()
      This methode returns the result of the LinkedList.poll();
      Methods in moteur that return types with arguments of type CardsAJouer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<CardsAJouer> Jest.getCards()
      getter
      java.util.ArrayList<CardsAJouer> Offer.getCards()
      getter
      java.util.LinkedList<CardsAJouer> DrawDeck.getCardsDD()
      getter
      Methods in moteur with parameters of type CardsAJouer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void DrawDeck.addCardDD​(CardsAJouer card)
      Store a card into the collection cards, by using the methode java.util.LinkedList.push(<E>).
      void Offer.addCardOffer​(CardsAJouer card)
      This methode can add a card, being the parameter tranferred in, and add it to the Array List cards
      void Jest.addCardToJest​(CardsAJouer card)
      This methode cans add a card to a Jest, it will automatically check if the card is a Joker, Coeur, Ace.
      void Stack.addCardToStack​(CardsAJouer card)
      addCardToStack(CardsAJouer card) can add a card to the existing LinkedList cards, by calling the default methode of LinkedList.push(E);
      void Player.receiveThrophie​(CardsAJouer throphie)
      After the game, the player might meets the condition of the trophies.

    • Uses of CardsAJouer in Vue

      Methods in Vue with parameters of type CardsAJouer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      javax.swing.JButton checkJestDialog.check_card​(CardsAJouer card)
      This function will responsible for checking which card to be showed.
      javax.swing.JButton VuePlayer.displayCard​(CardsAJouer card)
      This function will responsible for checking which card to be showed.
